extendedInfo.description: Written by an Avid Bowler, this Bowling app will track stats that will help improve your game!Keep track of your bowling stats by adding games frame by frame, roll by roll! Enter Bowling Pins you left per shot to see what spares you leave, how often you leave them, and how often you pick them up!  League Play! Organize your bowling games in leagues so you can see how you are performing in specific bowling leagues.Now you can enter your Tournament Games as well!  Default tournament modes are singles, doubles, or team.  But you can add any other type of tournament that you roll in.  Tournaments allow you to enter different types of games for the same day of a tournament.  Enter game specific details so you can track stats by Bowling Ball, Bowling League, Bowling Alley, Oil Pattern, etc!-If you don't feel like adding bowling games pin by pin, you can add only game score.-Backup/Restore bowler information! On the first page of Strike out Stats hit Menu -> Import/Export Database.-Import scores from trial.  Must export the database from the demo version first.  After exporting from the demo, you can then import that database into the full version.-Edit Tenth Frame - Once your game is over you can edit any frame by tapping the frame number above that frame.

reviews.title: Decent
reviews.comment: It pretty user friendly and reliable. I like how it returns to where you left off if you have to exit to use other features on your phone.  My only wish is that it would allow me to record scores for more than one person.
reviews.author: Tracy Schatteman

reviews.title: Awesome
reviews.comment: Would be five stars if the graphs would plot four leagues! Only shows three + practice + running average, so whichever league I bowled longest ago is always left off
reviews.author: Rebecca Skinner

reviews.title: Great bowling app
reviews.comment: Great app!!! Has all stats u could ask for...things I would like to add...deleting a league or tournament...deleting an unfinished game..thanks eric
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Screen to big after update
reviews.comment: After the last couple of updates the screen is now to big and I can\'t zoom out.  It was perfect on my galaxy tab until the recent updates.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Optimus L5 (Screen to big after update too)
reviews.comment: I really loved this app but after the last couple of updates the screen is now to big and I can\'t zoom out or scroll or anything to select or unselect pin#1. It was perfect on my Optimus L5 until the recent updates. Its been 3 months since i asked for the correction, and nothing. (Paid version)
reviews.author: Oscar Galindo

reviews.title: Great update
reviews.comment: The feature that I have been waiting for.  Best bowling app!!!
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Great
reviews.comment: Such a great app well done
reviews.author: Liam Brown

reviews.comment: Great app
reviews.author: Sa\'id Cortijo

reviews.title: All A Bowler Can Ask For!
reviews.comment: I Love this app!!!  Just enter your pin info and it does the rest. It provides complete stats of each entered game and it\'s \"uncomplicated\" too. Did I mention I LOVE this app?
reviews.author: Laura Wake

reviews.title: Love it!
reviews.comment: Tracks many great stats and is very reliable. Would like to see a pocket shot option to track pocket hits.
reviews.author: Joey Iglesias

reviews.title: Small buttons
reviews.comment: After the latest update the save and back buttons have been reduced to a very small square with a single letter.
reviews.author: Wayne McKeever

reviews.title: Perfect!
reviews.comment: Could not ask for anything better!
reviews.author: richard lewis

reviews.title: Great app
reviews.comment: I Use it all the time and have had no problems. Love the new updates.
reviews.author: Wayde Matthews

reviews.title: Nothing to change
reviews.comment: Does everything I ask of it, very stable and easy to use. Love the pin by pin scoring.
reviews.author: Jason Gagnon

reviews.title: Love this App
reviews.comment: Keeps me on track as to my score at % of spares.
reviews.author: Dorlan Joshway

reviews.title: Awesome
reviews.comment: I love this app.  It works great if your a stat guy or just want to track your improvement its well worth the price.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: One flaw, and one wish...
reviews.comment: After three weeks of use, the one single \"bug\" that is irritating me to the point of almost trashing this app is... if the phone goes to sleep or even rotates its screen (any movement), the app picks this up as a rolled ball, thus places a \"dash\" as score. Have to \"undo\", then touch \"next\" to get back. The wish? If it had provision to note starting point and mark, I could live with the one \"flaw\".
reviews.author: Rowdy Jordan

reviews.title: Almost Perfect
reviews.comment: This is a great app. I just switched from an IPhone to a Droid and was worried about finding a program to track my bowling stats. This program seems to fit the bill. I only wish there was a tournament section. If so, I would have given 5 stars. Still a great program though.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Well thought out and useful
reviews.comment: This is a great app and really useful. You can record data at any level eg game, frames or even specifuc spares left.  Stats are brillant and data can be pulled out by centre, ball, lane condition or league!   Only thing i\'d say is missing is being able to record one off tournaments which have to be created as a league.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Great app!
reviews.comment: My only complaint is I would like to be able to export the info to a website to allow myself to share all the info with my friends and coach and allow people to comment! i am a web developer and I would be happy to help!
reviews.author: Michael Sheldon
